targets.rawSql:
SELECT *
FROM (
  SELECT created_at, window, project, cluster, namespace, service, risk_level, model, score, confidence,
         (llm_summary != '') AS llm_present,
         substring(if(llm_summary != '', llm_summary, reason), 1, 800) AS llm_summary
  FROM soc.anomalies
  WHERE window >= now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY
  ORDER BY created_at DESC
  LIMIT 100
)
ORDER BY created_at ASC
